verses.name: Exodus 39:27
verses.text: And they made coats of fine linen of woven work for Aaron, and for his sons,

verses.name: Exodus 39:28
verses.text: And a mitre of fine linen, and goodly bonnets of fine linen, and linen breeches of fine twined linen,

verses.name: Exodus 39:29
verses.text: And a girdle of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet, of needlework; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Exodus 39:30
verses.text: And they made the plate of the holy crown of pure gold, and wrote upon it a writing, like to the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.
